review: Doctor was very friendly!She answered to all my queries relating to my diabetic issues!She guided me appropriately in all respects!

Dr Kanchan is my saviour, she saved my Life during covid. She's not only a brilliant doctor but also a wonderful human being. My family and i are always indebted to her for taking care of me and my family during the most traumatic time of our life, she's our angel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: Doctor will give her decisions without even examining you and will just write you a list of tests  and scare you to the core telling that you will have multiple disorders and needs to be checked . Or she will recommend to get admitted to get the treatment . She's in a rush to finish talking to you and not at all keen to know the patient's problems in detail

I am very much satisfied with Dr Kanchan’s treatment. i was suffering from cough and cold .. it was a mind Bronchitis . *** **** **** **** ********* ***** ***** ** *****. I will definitely look forward to visit her again in case of any sickness. She is very friendly and listens to your issues patiently. Thanks Dr Kanchan

I am a retired IPS officer residing in HRBR Kalyana nagara Bengaluru and frequently visit Dr Kanchan for all my immediate medical problems.
She ** **** ************* *** provide perfect treatment for the ailments. Make patients comfortable to speak the symptoms etc,. 
I strongly recommend the Doctor who practices in Specialist hospital.
doctor was knowledgeable and prescribed medications post checking on the patient. overall doctor is friendly and concerned

The doctor does not pay attention, is very casual in her approach and does not give full picture/understanding - few examples below 
- recommended B12 injections over oral medication - which resulted in super bad acne (I already have a scarring from acne which is clearly visible) - never told me side effects of taking injections 
- during covid she didn’t even bother to speak for 30 seconds and got CT scan done and gave a treatment without any explanation and also recommended to get hospitalised - when asked for reason, it was supposed to be precautionary which no one other recommended when they looked at the CT scan

Overall will not recommend this doctor
Dr Kanchan is one of the most friendliest and supportive doctor I have ever met. She treated illnesses very well and was very empathetic as well.

I visited her twice and shes always in a rush as if she has to catch a train.she just wants to get rid of her patients as soon as possible.She won't explain the disease  nor gives us the time to think for asking questions.
Doctor was very friendly!She answered to all my queries relating to my diabetic issues!She guided me appropriately in all respects!

Dr Kanchan is my saviour, she saved my Life during covid. She's not only a brilliant doctor but also a wonderful human being. My family and i are always indebted to her for taking care of me and my family during the most traumatic time of our life, she's our angel.
